front.title: Performance Measurement (PM) with Flow-ID in Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER)

abstract.t: This document proposes one new performance measurement method of Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER) IOAM information. The controller can realize the closed-loop control of end-to-end quality assurance for BIER through collecting and analyzing of BIER IOAM and related path algorithms in the new method.
